item.title: An Introduction to Vim Macros
item.description: Vim is my favourite text editor, because it is minimalist while also being insanely configurable. While I may describe my ideal Vim setup sometime in the future, I do want to share some tips and tricks that make Vim so damn efficient for certain tasks. Today, I shall focus on macros. Here’s the key idea to keep in mind when discussing about Vim. Vim is not just an editor, it is a text manipulation program.
